name: Two Mountains One Goat - No Ads
name_original: Two Mountains One Goat - No Ads
description:
Two Mountains One Goat: Jump as high as you can but watch out for the birds!

Users are calling this the new Flappy Bird but more addictive as the vertical jump makes it even more challenging. Make it to the top of the Leader Board by jumping higher than your friends.

Are you a Billy Goat or a Mountaineer? Unlock achievements by reaching new heights. Beware of the flapping birds as they’ll make you fall.

Classic graphics and sounds effects
Global leader board
One touch control
Unlockable achievements
Seriously addictive!

Download the app for free and see how high your goat can go!
